column5: my god man it's killin me!   im sitting here watching rudolf with the kids for the 100th time wishing it was cold enough to make ice!  by the way... ginny says 4 inches is plenty in her opinion... just be safe!  cheers, ryan
Maybe he was Skunked his first day out in the back yard......

You must have missed it Ryan, i did actually post on the 1st page of replies to the post that my buddy was not gonna make it so i decided against it.  I'll have a report by Sunday though...my buddy me and have been invited by the Vexilar people to go fishing for greenbacks on the Red River (Manitoba)this saturday while they shoot an episode of Ice fishing Today....should be a blast...hopefully w'ell get some fish too.   LOL...thats exactly what happened last year on my first venture out....but hey....at least i was out there
Watch your step on the Red this weekend. Don't go too far out.  Its still sketchy, only 2-4" of ice in alot of places.
The Vexilar people, eh?  They gonna let you bring your Lowrance?!

I was gonna sneak it into my ice hut and hide it if anyone came knocking.....lol  But in the end it all got cancelled, oh well....saved myself couple hundred bucks in gas etc.....  shame though...would love to try for those big greenback walleye on the Red River one day.  Had to settle for an hour in front of the house today.
You should go for those Red River Catfish sometime Simon, they're HUGE!!!  .. I'd be glad to join you if you could swing by and pick me up!
Sure thing Glen....you live in Newfoundland right?...i could tell by your accent....
